snippet: Assemblyman Harvey Weisenberg said his son, Ricky, 54, who has cerebral palsy, was abused at a group home run by AHRC Nassau.
abstract: Assemblyman Harvey Weisenberg announces plans to file suit in Brooklyn federal court against AHRC Nassau, a local chapter of the nation's largest provider of services to people with developmental disabilities; Weisenberg says that his son Ricky, who has cerebral palsy, was repeatedly abused by AHRC Nassau employee Dwayne Edwards at a group home.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Harvey Weisenberg said his son, Ricky, 54, who has cerebral palsy, was abused at a group home run by AHRC Nassau.

headline.seo: Assemblyman to File Suit Charging Abuse of His Disabled Son
headline.main: Lawmaker to File Suit Charging Abuse of His Disabled Son
headline.print_headline: Lawmaker to File Suit Charging Abuse of His Disabled Son
